overview: Randy, a basketball player from SMA Nusantara, falls in love with a new student named Tiara, an old friend from junior high school. But at the same time, Valdo, a rich kid also falls in love with Tiara. When Valdo finds out that Tiara likes basketball, Valdo forces her to join the basketball team, and interferes with Randy's efforts.
title: Anak Basket
